settings.title: Increase Strength
settings.content: Contains Creatine and L-Carnitine, key nutrients that support muscle growth and endurance.

settings.title: Boost Energy
settings.content: CoQ10, alongside Taurine, enhance cellular energy production, mental clarity, and overall vitality for daily demands.

settings.title: Improve Recovery
settings.content: Amino acids Anserine and Carnosine play pivotal roles in reducing fatigue, boosting antioxidant activity, and aiding post-exercise recovery.

settings.title: Boost Mental Performance
settings.content: Choline and Phosphatidylserine work in tandem, optimizing cognition and focus.

settings.title: Bioavailable Nutrients
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients paired with essential fatty acids deliver superior absorption, maximizing nutrient utilization and overall benefits.

IS THE WARRIOR STACK FOR ME?

For those who demand an all-encompassing nutritional edge. If you're constantly pushing boundaries, seeking to optimize your strength, energy, and recovery, this stack is for you.

settings.quote: Nutrient rich organs transform how you look and feel, just like they transformed me.
settings.author: Georges St-Pierre

settings.supporting_product_description: Whole Package includes liver, testicle, and whole blood extract. It provide strategic support for reproductive health and performance, blood flow, and hormone health.

Mood Memory & Brain provides strategic support for better learning, focus, mood, as well as mental acuity. It includes grass-fed and finished brain, bone marrow, and liver and stimulates healthy neural connections.

settings.primary_product_description: Warrior is the foundational supplement included in the Warrior Stack. It provides unique and essential support found in grass-fed and grass-finished heart and liver. These powerful organs include 12+ powerful nutrients to help reach your goals.

settings.title: CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is nature's richest source of CoQ10, a nutrient shown to improve mitochondrial function and energy production, and to enhance exercise performance.

settings.title: Anserine & Carnosine
settings.nutrient_description: Two amino acids which are effective in reducing muscle fatigue and improving antioxidant activity.

settings.title: Taurine
settings.nutrient_description: Improves muscle function and exercise performance through the reduction of reactive oxygen species. Is also a powerful antioxidant in muscle tissue and improves insulin sensitivity.

settings.title: Creatine
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is one of nature's richest sources of this nutrient, which is crucial for muscle growth and recovery, and essential for energy production in the muscles.

settings.title: L-Carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Required to produce energy (ATP) in the muscles, and to protect against muscle damage. Improves sport and gym performance in elite athletes.

settings.title: Choline
settings.nutrient_description: A key nutrient involved in muscle neurotransmitter synthesis.

settings.title: Glutamine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid required to speed up muscle recovery and reduce delayed-onset muscle soreness.

settings.title: Iron
settings.nutrient_description: A critical trace mineral required for red blood cell formation and the repair of muscle tissue.

settings.title: Essential Fatty Acids
settings.nutrient_description: Necessary for optimal reproductive and sexual health.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Red Blood Cells, White Blood Cells, and Platelets
settings.nutrient_description: Involved in oxygen transport, the immune response, and wound healing.

settings.title: Activin and inhibin
settings.nutrient_description: Involved in the formation of sex hormones, reproductive cells, as well as the sex glands and organs.

settings.title: Endothelin
settings.nutrient_description: Modulates vascular health, cellular regeneration, and hormone production.

settings.title: Epidermal growth factor
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes healthy sperm function and motility as well as fertility.

settings.title: Zinc
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for healthy testosterone production, sperm quality, and acts as a powerful antioxidant to combat inflammation.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Copper, Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Phosphatidylserine
settings.nutrient_description: A phospholipid found robustly in brain and nervous tissue essential for stress management, working memory, and optimal cognitive performance.

settings.title: Sphingolipids
settings.nutrient_description: A special type of lipid (fat) found abundantly in brain and nervous tissue provides physical and chemical stability, resistance, as well as supports proper nerve cell performance and communication.

settings.title: Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF)
settings.nutrient_description: A critical growth factor found in brain to enhance nerve cell health, communication, synaptic transmission, and protection. Low BDNF has been identified in many neurodegenerative disease states.

settings.title: DHA/EPA
settings.nutrient_description: Essential omega-3 fatty acids found robustly beef (bovine) brain critical for focus as well as moderating inflammation associated with anxiousness, depressiveness, and other mood-related symptoms.

settings.title: Pantothenic Acid (B5)
settings.nutrient_description: A key vitamin required for the synthesis of coenzyme A (CoA). Beyond its role in cell metabolism, CoA contributes to the synthesis of cholesterol, amino acids, phospholipids, neurotransmitters, and steroid hormones.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Warrior, Whole Package, and Mood Memory & Brain includes vital and  potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: After taking Warrior supplement I noticed a significant boost in my workouts. I am able to have a longer workout and with more energy...
settings.author: Dragan J.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids for optimal benefits.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the WARRIOR Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is for individuals demanding an all-encompassing nutritional edge. If you're goal is to optimize your strength, energy, and recovery, then this stack is for you!

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids for optimal benefits.
